name: NutLad Vs. BeanBoy
description:
BeanBoy has corrupted the forest's vegetation, and sent all of the flora wild! Wielding the power of the four Nut-Helms, only NutLad can rise up to the challenge and take back his home!

I made this game over the course of a week for GBJAM 10 - I had a hell of a lot of fun working on it, despite overscoping a fair bit. It still has its fair share of bugs, which I'd like to iron out over time, as well as finishing up the other bosses I didn't manage to fit in. I hope you enjoy it!

Controls

Gameboy-style controls (Arrow Keys, Z, X, Backspace, Return)

Movement: Arrow Keys

Jump: Z

Attack: X

Descend Platform: Down + Z

Dodge: Down + X

Helmets: Backspace

Pause: Return

Quit: Esc

Note that NutLad's starting Acorn Helm currently has no effect other than aesthetics at this point. This isn't a bug, just a heads up!

**0.11b Post-Deadline BugFix Update Changelog**
- Fixed bug preventing bosses and certain enemies from resetting on player death
- Fixed bug preventing 2 health leaves from appearing
- Fixed bug preventing projectile enemy AI from functioning
- Fixed a small handful of graphical glitches regarding text displaying correctly

Programming, Design, Pixel Art & Audio all by Retrobeat.

All audio was created using LSDJ, and recorded into Logic Pro X directly from a DMG Gameboy.
